origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'InsuranceAPI.get_housing_fund_adjustments', 'description': 'This function provides information on housing fund adjustments based on the policy type, adjustment type, and age of the applicant.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of housing fund policy, e.g., contribution, withdrawal.'}, {'name': 'adjustmentType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of adjustment, e.g., rate, limit.'}, {'name': 'age', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The age of the person applying for the policy.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'adjustmentDetails', 'description': 'The details of the housing fund adjustment.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 InsuranceAPI.get_housing_fund_adjustments, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'housing_fund', 'adjustmentType'是'contribution_rate', 'age'是'24'.
